comment.author: 16333811@N00
comment._content: This image has been used in the indicommons.org post: Black History across the Commons - Part 2

comment.author: 83985037@N04
comment._content: Can anyone confirm if this is a 15 yr old Arthur Ashe and Robert W. Johnson Jr., tennis coach?  The build and age are spot on and this is not a casual player which would have been rare for the times.  The face appears to be off until this is blown up a few times and then compared in parts instead of as a whole. After doing some more research I am somewhat convinced the smaller boy is Lange Johnson.
